  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Nomenclatura</string>
            <string language="en">Nomenclature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezeichnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nomenclature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomenclatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nomenclatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονοματολογία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe profundizar en el modo de dar nombre a los seres vivos. Para ello tiene que buscar información sobre los organismos que velan por que se apliquen normas para el correcto sistema de nomenclatura.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to study in greater depth the way in which names are given to living beings. In order to do so they will have to look for information about the organisms which make sure that norms are applied to ensure a correct system of nomenclature.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Nomenclatura</string>
            <string language="en">Nomenclature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer tiefgehender 
die Methode studieren muß, in der Namen zu lebenden Wesen gegeben 
werden. Um müssen sie so zu tun nach Informationen über die 
organismen suchen die überprüfen ob Normen angewendet werden um ein 
korrektes System der Bezeichnung sicherzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit étudier 
plus en détail la voie dont des noms sont donnés aux êtres vivants.
Afin de les faire ainsi devront rechercher des informations sur 
les organizations qui s'assurent que des normes sont appliquées pour 
assurer un système correct de la nomenclature.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que estudar em uma
profundidade mais grande a maneira em que os nomes são dados aos 
seres vivos. A fim fazer assim terão que procurar a 
informação sobre os organismos que se certificam de que as normas 
estão aplicadas para assegurar um sistema correto da nomenclatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve studiare nella 
profondità più grande il modo in cui i nomi sono dati agli esseri 
viventi. Per fare così dovranno cercare le informazioni sugli 
organismi che si assicurano che le norme sono applicate per accertare 
un sistema corretto della nomenclatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να μελετήσει σε
μεγαλύτερο βάθος τον τρόπο με τον οποίο τα ονόματα δίνονται στα 
ζωντανά οντα. Προκειμένου να κάνουν έτσι θα πρέπει να 
ψάξουν τις πληροφορίες για τους οργανισμούς που σιγουρεύονται ότι
οι κανόνες εφαρμόζονται για να εξασφαλίσουν ένα σωστό σύστημα 
της ονοματολογίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nomenclature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomenclatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
